topics.title: Overview
topics.description: Course introduction and objectives.

topics.title: Chemical Bonding in Organic Molecules
topics.description: Explore covalent bonding, electronegativity, and bond polarity in organic compounds.

topics.title: Hybridization and Molecular Geometry
topics.description: Understand the concepts of sp, sp2, and sp3 hybridization and their influence on molecular shape.

topics.title: Drawing Organic Structures
topics.description: Learn how to represent organic molecules using Lewis structures, condensed formulas, and skeletal structures.

topics.title: Nomenclature of Alkanes and Alkyl Groups
topics.description: Master the IUPAC nomenclature system for naming alkanes and alkyl substituents.

topics.title: Nomenclature of Alkenes, Alkynes, and Cyclic Alkanes
topics.description: Extend the nomenclature rules to include alkenes, alkynes, and cyclic alkanes.

topics.title: Functional Groups
topics.description: Introduction to common functional groups and their properties.

topics.title: Isomers: Constitutional and Stereoisomers
topics.description: Distinguish between constitutional isomers and stereoisomers.

topics.title: Resonance
topics.description: Understand resonance structures and their contribution to molecular stability.

topics.title: Acid-Base Chemistry in Organic Reactions
topics.description: Apply acid-base concepts to understand reactivity in organic systems.

topics.title: Introduction to Spectroscopy
topics.description: Overview of spectroscopic techniques used in organic chemistry.

topics.title: Introduction to Chirality
topics.description: Exploration of the concept of chirality and its importance in organic chemistry.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Alkanes
topics.description: Examine the physical and chemical properties of alkanes.

topics.title: Conformations of Alkanes
topics.description: Analyze different conformations of alkanes and their relative energies.

topics.title: Cycloalkane Stability: Ring Strain
topics.description: Understand the concept of ring strain in cycloalkanes.

topics.title: Conformations of Cyclohexane
topics.description: Explore the chair and boat conformations of cyclohexane and their interconversion.

topics.title: Reactions of Alkanes: Halogenation
topics.description: Study the mechanism of free-radical halogenation of alkanes.

topics.title: Oxidation of Alkanes: Combustion
topics.description: Understand the combustion reaction of alkanes and its applications.

topics.title: Industrial Importance of Alkanes
topics.description: Discuss the various industrial applications of alkanes.

topics.title: Petroleum Refining
topics.description: Overview of the petroleum refining process and its products.

topics.title: Cracking and Reforming
topics.description: Discuss cracking and reforming processes in petroleum refining.

topics.title: Environmental Impact of Alkanes
topics.description: Discuss the environmental impact of alkanes and their use.

topics.title: Alkane Synthesis
topics.description: Methods to synthesize alkanes.

topics.title: Properties of Branched Alkanes
topics.description: Understand the differences between branched and unbranched alkanes.

topics.title: Chirality and Stereoisomers
topics.description: Define chirality and differentiate between enantiomers and diastereomers.

topics.title: Enantiomers and Optical Activity
topics.description: Understand optical activity and how it relates to enantiomers.

topics.title: R and S Configuration
topics.description: Assign R and S configurations to chiral centers using the Cahn-Ingold-Prelog rules.

topics.title: Diastereomers and Meso Compounds
topics.description: Identify diastereomers and meso compounds.

topics.title: Racemic Mixtures and Resolution
topics.description: Understand racemic mixtures and methods for resolving them into pure enantiomers.

topics.title: Chirality in Cyclic Systems
topics.description: Examine chirality in cyclic molecules, including chiral cyclohexane derivatives.

topics.title: Stereoisomers of Alkenes: Cis-Trans Isomerism
topics.description: Understand cis-trans isomerism in alkenes.

topics.title: E and Z Nomenclature
topics.description: Assign E and Z configurations to alkenes using the Cahn-Ingold-Prelog rules.

topics.title: Stereochemistry and Reactions
topics.description: Analyze how stereochemistry influences the outcome of organic reactions.

topics.title: Prochirality
topics.description: Understand the concept of prochirality and its significance in enzymatic reactions.

topics.title: Stereoselective and Stereospecific Reactions
topics.description: Differentiate between stereoselective and stereospecific reactions.

topics.title: Asymmetric Synthesis
topics.description: Introduction to asymmetric synthesis and chiral catalysts.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Alkyl Halides
topics.description: Examine the structure and physical properties of alkyl halides.

topics.title: SN2 Reactions: Mechanism and Stereochemistry
topics.description: Understand the mechanism and stereochemical outcome of SN2 reactions.

topics.title: Factors Affecting SN2 Reactions
topics.description: Analyze the factors that influence the rate of SN2 reactions, including substrate structure, nucleophile strength, and solvent effects.

topics.title: SN1 Reactions: Mechanism and Stereochemistry
topics.description: Understand the mechanism and stereochemical outcome of SN1 reactions.

topics.title: Factors Affecting SN1 Reactions
topics.description: Analyze the factors that influence the rate of SN1 reactions, including substrate structure, leaving group ability, and solvent effects.

topics.title: E2 Reactions: Mechanism and Stereochemistry
topics.description: Understand the mechanism and stereochemical outcome of E2 reactions.

topics.title: Zaitsev's Rule
topics.description: Apply Zaitsev's rule to predict the major product of elimination reactions.

topics.title: E1 Reactions: Mechanism and Stereochemistry
topics.description: Understand the mechanism and stereochemical outcome of E1 reactions.

topics.title: Competition between SN1/E1 and SN2/E2 Reactions
topics.description: Predict the major product in reactions where SN1/E1 and SN2/E2 pathways compete.

topics.title: Synthesis Using Alkyl Halides
topics.description: Learn how to use alkyl halides as building blocks in organic synthesis.

topics.title: Grignard Reagents
topics.description: Introduction to Grignard reagents and their reactions.

topics.title: Organolithium Reagents
topics.description: Introduction to organolithium reagents and their reactions.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Alcohols
topics.description: Examine the structure, physical properties, and acidity of alcohols.

topics.title: Reactions of Alcohols: Dehydration and Oxidation
topics.description: Study the dehydration and oxidation reactions of alcohols.

topics.title: Formation of Alkyl Halides from Alcohols
topics.description: Learn how to convert alcohols into alkyl halides using various reagents.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Ethers
topics.description: Examine the structure and physical properties of ethers.

topics.title: Williamson Ether Synthesis
topics.description: Understand the mechanism of the Williamson ether synthesis.

topics.title: Reactions of Ethers: Acidic Cleavage
topics.description: Study the acidic cleavage of ethers.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Epoxides
topics.description: Examine the structure and properties of epoxides.

topics.title: Reactions of Epoxides: Ring Opening
topics.description: Study the ring-opening reactions of epoxides under acidic and basic conditions.

topics.title: Crown Ethers and Phase-Transfer Catalysis
topics.description: Introduction to crown ethers and their use in phase-transfer catalysis.

topics.title: Thiols and Sulfides
topics.description: Introduction to thiols and sulfides and their properties.

topics.title: Alcohol Synthesis
topics.description: Methods to synthesize alcohols.

topics.title: Protecting Groups for Alcohols
topics.description: Use of protecting groups to selectively react with parts of organic molecules.

modules.title: Module 6: Alkenes, Alkynes, and Pi Systems

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Alkenes and Alkynes
topics.description: Examine the structure, bonding, and physical properties of alkenes and alkynes.

topics.title: Addition Reactions of Alkenes: Electrophilic Addition
topics.description: Study the mechanism of electrophilic addition reactions of alkenes.

topics.title: Markovnikov's Rule
topics.description: Apply Markovnikov's rule to predict the regiochemistry of alkene addition reactions.

topics.title: Hydroboration-Oxidation
topics.description: Understand the hydroboration-oxidation reaction and its stereochemistry.

topics.title: Hydrogenation of Alkenes and Alkynes
topics.description: Study the hydrogenation of alkenes and alkynes using metal catalysts.

topics.title: Addition Reactions of Alkynes
topics.description: Explore the addition reactions of alkynes, including hydrogenation and halogenation.

topics.title: Acidity of Terminal Alkynes
topics.description: Understand the acidity of terminal alkynes and their reactions with strong bases.

topics.title: Dienes and Conjugated Systems
topics.description: Introduction to dienes and conjugated systems.

topics.title: Allylic Systems
topics.description: Introduction to allylic systems and allylic substitution reactions.

topics.title: Diels-Alder Reaction
topics.description: Understand the mechanism and stereochemistry of the Diels-Alder reaction.

topics.title: Electrophilic Aromatic Substitution
topics.description: Introduction to electrophilic aromatic substitution reactions.

topics.title: Aromaticity and Huckel's Rule
topics.description: Understand the concept of aromaticity and Huckel's rule.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Aldehydes and Ketones
topics.description: Examine the structure, bonding, and physical properties of aldehydes and ketones.

topics.title: Nucleophilic Addition to Carbonyl Groups
topics.description: Understand the mechanism of nucleophilic addition reactions to carbonyl groups.

topics.title: Reactions with Alcohols: Acetal and Hemiacetal Formation
topics.description: Study the formation of acetals and hemiacetals from aldehydes and ketones.

topics.title: Reactions with Amines: Imine and Enamine Formation
topics.description: Study the formation of imines and enamines from aldehydes and ketones.

topics.title: Wittig Reaction
topics.description: Understand the mechanism of the Wittig reaction and its use in alkene synthesis.

topics.title: Oxidation of Aldehydes
topics.description: Study the oxidation reactions of aldehydes.

topics.title: Reduction of Aldehydes and Ketones
topics.description: Study the reduction reactions of aldehydes and ketones using various reagents.

topics.title: Aldol Condensation
topics.description: Understand the mechanism of the aldol condensation reaction.

topics.title: Claisen Condensation
topics.description: Understand the mechanism of the Claisen condensation reaction.

topics.title: Michael Addition
topics.description: Understand the mechanism of the Michael addition reaction.

topics.title: Enolates
topics.description: Introduction to enolates and their reactivity.

topics.title: Alpha Halogenation
topics.description: Understand alpha halogenation of aldehydes and ketones.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Carboxylic Acids
topics.description: Examine the structure, bonding, physical properties, and acidity of carboxylic acids.

topics.title: Nomenclature of Carboxylic Acids
topics.description: Learn the IUPAC nomenclature system for naming carboxylic acids.

topics.title: Reactions of Carboxylic Acids: Esterification
topics.description: Study the esterification reaction of carboxylic acids.

topics.title: Reactions of Carboxylic Acids: Amide Formation
topics.description: Study the amide formation reaction of carboxylic acids.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Esters
topics.description: Examine the structure and physical properties of esters.

topics.title: Hydrolysis of Esters
topics.description: Study the acid-catalyzed and base-promoted hydrolysis of esters.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Amides
topics.description: Examine the structure and physical properties of amides.

topics.title: Hydrolysis of Amides
topics.description: Study the acid-catalyzed and base-promoted hydrolysis of amides.

topics.title: Structure and Properties of Acid Chlorides and Anhydrides
topics.description: Examine the structure and properties of acid chlorides and anhydrides.

topics.title: Reactions of Acid Chlorides and Anhydrides
topics.description: Study the reactions of acid chlorides and anhydrides with nucleophiles.

topics.title: Decarboxylation
topics.description: Understand the decarboxylation reaction.

topics.title: Capstone Project: Multi-Step Synthesis of a Target Molecule
topics.description: Apply the knowledge gained throughout the course to design and propose a multi-step synthesis of a complex organic molecule. This project integrates concepts from all modules and emphasizes problem-solving skills.
